title: Caught Cheating on Camera Ft. Remi Cruz
description:
Boyfriend invites one of his favorite guests Remi Cruz to play host while Lauren is out of town. 

Skin care failures, Disney-channel nightmares, and the end of Azn Girl Squad. Tune in to find out if Remi finally finds a hobby.

As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/wt9
Go to Purple.com/wild10 promo code wild10, for 10% off any order of $200 or more. 
Find a vaccine near you at vaccines.gov
Go to Curology.com/WILD for a free 30-day trial, just pay for shipping and handling!
Cuyana never goes on sale but as a special offer, my listeners can receive 10% off your first order over $150 plus free shipping. Visit Cuyana.com/WILD to get your individual code. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
